thread.title: Watch Scarlett Johansson and Her Girlfriends Accidentally Kill a Guy In the Trailer for Rough Night
thread.title_full: Watch Scarlett Johansson and Her Girlfriends Accidentally Kill a Guy In the Trailer for Rough Night

author: Bobby Finger on The Muse, shared by Bobby Finger to Jezebel
title: Watch Scarlett Johansson and Her Girlfriends Accidentally Kill a Guy In the Trailer for Rough Night
text:
Go to permalink 
Do you remember the trailer for the upcoming comedy Girls Trip ? In it, Jada Pinkett Smith, Queen Latifah, Regina Hall, and Tiffany Haddish go to New Orleans for a wild weekend together. The trailer for the upcoming comedy Rough Night is pretty much the same thing, only it’s set in Miami, the women are played by Scarlett Johansson, Ilana Glazer, Kate McKinnon, Zoe Kravitz, and Jillian Bell, and—oh right—they accidentally kill a guy. Advertisement 
These two movies would make a good double feature. Recommended Stories
